title: Help deciding new champion?
body:
I'm looking for a new top or mid lane champion, I couldnt decide who so I decided to ask here my guidelines are:
- Requires a decent amount of skill ( most of my champions are easy to play, so I want someone harder )
- Decent sustain
- Carry potential
- Strong early game
- Good damage

replies.body:
I recomend Karthus in mid.

He is pretty good. =D

Lissandra

Kills popular choices (Fizz and LB)
Basic skill is brutal (Q), and shoots through minions so they can't hide away from it by having a minion wave.

Extremely hard to play, if you miss a chain in your combo you will be the one going back to base.

Strong early game and late, but if you miss a chain in your combo your team will be going back to base.

People are unfamiliar with your mechanism so they just come to get destroyed. (refer to Q)

Renekton (4800 ip). I mean, not much skill per se but he's fun and can be a little mechanical.

Gragas (3150 ip) is fun. I like him. can play top or mid too without much worry. NOt much mechanics, but an ult + flash + body slam always look cool.

Nidalee (3150 ip). Can be AD or AP top or mid. Strong lane bully and splitpusher if you go AD. Better team fighter and sieger if you go AP. Requires some level of mechanics to use well.

Xin Zhao (1350 ip), though he's pretty mindless. E+R+W+Q auto auto auto
Thank you for the reply and multiple champions
I just tried gragas he is extremely fun, I carried :D
Hmm.. Ahri. Or Nid. Nid is definitely one of the most fun champs to play.
